org.apache.ambari.server.controller.logging

Class LoggingRequestHelperImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ambari.server.controller.logging.LoggingRequestHelperImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LoggingRequestHelper

    public class LoggingRequestHelperImpl
extends Object
implements LoggingRequestHelper
    Convenience class to handle the connection details of a LogSearch query request.
